name: The Kaiju And The Birds
description:
Create a relaxing ambient music procedurally generated while playing. A Kaiju helping birds to fly through nuclear clouds.

You play as a Kaiju. Birds try to fly but they get caught in nuclear clouds. Your goal is to help as many birds as possible to escape.

There is no end to this game. The idea is to play the game, and to enjoy the music that you create while playing it.

I made this project for the Kaijujam#2.

Sound engine

All sounds are procedurally generated. I used Faust to develop a synthesis backend, and events on screen trigger some part of this synthesizer.

Level procedurally generated

There are a lot of things guided by randomness in the game :

  • When you start the game, the level is generated by putting in random positions the powerplants and the buildings
  • Birds start from random position every time they spawn
  • Some musical notes are picked randomly
